EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_Spring LDAP 2.0 7AM.Confirmation 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Spring Webinars: Spring LDAP 2.0
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Your registration is confirmed for the webinar Spring LDAP 2.0 with speaker Mattias Arthusson. We are looking forward to having you join us. To help maximize your webinar experience we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details:
Date: Tuesday, March 18, 2014 Europe: 2:00pm GMT (London, GMT) Join the WebEx <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=660826374> Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show all global call-in numbers Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 660 826 374
Thank you,
